scripts.serve:gateway: npm i --prefix gateway && npm start --prefix gateway
scripts.serve:recharge: npm i --prefix recharge-service  && npm run serve --prefix recharge-service
scripts.serve:auth: npm i --prefix  auth-service --legacy-peer-deps && npm run start:dev --prefix auth-service
scripts.serve:wallet: npm i --prefix wallet-service && npm run serve --prefix wallet-service
scripts.build: npm i --prefix gateway && npm i --prefix recharge-service && npm run build --prefix recharge-service && npm i --force --prefix auth-service  && npm run build --prefix auth-service && npm i --prefix wallet-service && npm run build --prefix wallet-service
scripts.deploy:start: pm2 start gateway/server.js --name gateway && pm2 start auth-service/dist/main.js --name auth-service && pm2 start wallet-service/dist/index.js --name wallet-service && pm2 start recharge-service/dist/index.js --name recharge-service
